Here is Part 2 of our #rstats #tidyverse #dplyr guide!
It focuses on recently introduced across() and c_across(), which allow for applying the same functions repeatedly within a table -- superseding the use of the suffixes _if _at _all in dplyr main verbs. Feedbacks welcome! https://t.co/QhucQtQDyL

Here is Part 2 of our #rstats #tidyverse #dplyr guide!
It focuses on recently introduced across() and c_across(), which allow for applying the same functions repeatedly within a table -- superseding the use of the suffixes _if _at _all in dplyr main verbs. Feedbacks welcome! https://t.co/QhucQtQDyL
